NeedDef.label: —Åarbohydrates
NeedDef.description: Carbohydrates are the body's main source of energy. They are broken down into glucose, which is the body's preferred source of energy. Glucose is used by the brain, muscles, and other organs to function properly.

NeedDef.label: proteins
NeedDef.description: Proteins are one of the most important nutrients for our bodies. They are made up of amino acids, which are the building blocks of life.

NeedDef.label: vitamines
NeedDef.description: Vitamins are essential nutrients that your body needs to function properly.

NeedDef.label: food variaty
NeedDef.description: Different foods have different flavors, which can be stimulating and enjoyable.
